description:
In this video I discuss the recent phoronix article about Intel spotting a 3888.9% performance improvement In linux, and the patch that resulted in a performance hit and the subsequent patch that fixed the regression.

Links
https://www.phoronix.com/news/Intel-Linux-3888.9-Performance
https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=d4148aeab412432bf928f311eca8a2ba52bb05df
https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1229012
https://github.com/darktable-org/darktable/issues/17397
https://lkml.org/lkml/2024/10/24/381

title: Did Linux Just Get 40x Faster?
